body_html: I'm currently working on adding batched parameters to tf.truncated_normal, but currently it's significantly slower than the current implementation (with hard-coded parameters). If we can't match the performance of the current version, then we might want to add samplers with batches (and maybe other bells and whistles) to tf.contrib.distributions, and only add ops for common parameters or use cases that can be hard-coded for speed.

If we can't match the performance of the current version, then we might want to add samplers with batches (and maybe other bells and whistles) to tf.contrib.distributions, and only add ops for common parameters or use cases that can be hard-coded for speed.
